description: '''Indian hip hop''' is a genre of popular music developed in [[India]]. [[Desi hip hop]] is a term given by [[Bohemia (rapper)|Bohemia]] for music and culture which combines the influences of [[hip hop]] and the [[Indian subcontinent]]; the term [[desi]] referring to the [[South Asian diaspora]]. The term has also come to be used as an alternative for rap music and even pop music which involves rappers of South Asian origins. It is widely known today as [[Desi Hip Hop]] or DHH.
